name: bbswitch filename: /lib/modules/3.13.0-48-generic/updates/dkms/bbswitch.ko version: 0.7 author: Peter Wu <lekensteyn@gmail.com> description: Toggle the discrete graphics card license: GPL srcversion: 925FC29A3B8E35350E8E8AE depends: vermagic: 3.13.0-48-generic SMP mod_unload modversions parm: load_state:Initial card state (0 = off, 1 = on, -1 = unchanged) (int) parm: unload_state:Card state on unload (0 = off, 1 = on, -1 = unchanged) (int) parm: skip_optimus_dsm:Skip probe of Optimus discrete DSM (default = false) (bool)
